title: 341: Why We Quit “The Bachelor”
itunes:title: 341: Why We Quit “The Bachelor”
description:
First The Broads chat about their New Year’s Eve -  then they dive into WHY they are not recapping Clayton’s Bachelor season, get honest about what they have been processing, what the future holds, and then pull some Tarot cards with interesting results about 2021 vs 2022 in their personal lives. We love you #broadsquad!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***THRIVE MARKET: Go to THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY to get 40% off your first order AND a free gift!
